name: Crate Carrier
description:
Controls: WAS/Arrow keys, Shift to sprint.

You're attending your training to become a Crate Carrier. This prestigious job is the stuff of playground legends. Everybody wanted to become a Crate Carrier when they grew up, and if you pass these tests you will become one yourself!


This game was made for the Vertex Jam 2020 in just a few days.
